title: Control of phosphodiesterase activity in the regulator of biofilm dispersal RbdA from Pseudomonas aeruginosa
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Charlotte Cordery, Jack Craddock, Martin Malý, Kieran Basavaraja, Jeremy Webb, Martin Austin Walsh, Ivo Tews
The switch between planktonic and biofilm lifestyle correlates with intracellular concentration of the second messenger bis-(3’-5’)-cyclic dimeric guanosine monophosphate (c-di-GMP). While bacteria possess cyclase and phosphodiesterase enzymes to catalyse formation...
